114 
118 inline CHalfEdge * CVertex::most_ccw_in_halfedge()
119 {
120  //for interior vertex
121  if( !m_boundary )
122  {
123  return m_halfedge; //current half edge is the most ccw in halfedge
124  }
125 
126  //for boundary vertex
127  CHalfEdge * he = m_halfedge->ccw_rotate_about_target();
128  //rotate to the most ccw in halfedge
129  while( he != NULL )
130  {
131  m_halfedge = he;
132  he = m_halfedge->ccw_rotate_about_target();
133  }
134  // the halfedge of the vertex becomes the most ccw in halfedge
135  return m_halfedge;
136 };
137 
138 //most clockwise in halfedge
139 
140 inline CHalfEdge * CVertex::most_clw_in_halfedge()
141 {
142  //for interior vertex
143  if( !m_boundary )
144  {
145  return most_ccw_in_halfedge()->ccw_rotate_about_target(); //the most ccw in halfedge rotate ccwly once to get the most clw in halfedge
146  }
147  //for boundary vertex
148  CHalfEdge * he = m_halfedge->clw_rotate_about_target();
149  //rotate to the most clw in halfedge
150  while( he != NULL )
151  {
152  m_halfedge = he;
153  he = m_halfedge->clw_rotate_about_target();
154  }
155 
156  return m_halfedge;
157 };
158 
159 //most counter clockwise out halfedge
160 
161 inline CHalfEdge * CVertex::most_ccw_out_halfedge()
162 {
163  //for interior vertex
164  if( !m_boundary )
165  {
166  return most_ccw_in_halfedge()->he_sym(); //most ccw out halfedge is the dual of the most ccw in halfedge
167  }
168 
169  //for boundary vertex
170  CHalfEdge * he = m_halfedge->he_next();
171  //get the out halfedge which is the next halfedge of the most ccw in halfedge
172  CHalfEdge * ne = he->ccw_rotate_about_source();
173  //rotate ccwly around the source vertex
174  while( ne != NULL )
175  {
176  he = ne;
177  ne = he->ccw_rotate_about_source();
178  }
179 
180  return he;
181 };
182 
183 //most clockwise out halfedge
184 
185 inline CHalfEdge * CVertex::most_clw_out_halfedge()
186 {
187  //for interior vertex
188  if( !m_boundary )
189  {
190  return most_ccw_out_halfedge()->ccw_rotate_about_source(); //most ccw out halfedge rotate ccwly once about the source
191  }
192  //get one out halfedge
193  CHalfEdge * he = m_halfedge->he_next();
194  //rotate the out halfedge clwly about the source
195  CHalfEdge * ne = he->clw_rotate_about_source();
196 
197  while( ne != NULL )
198  {
199  he = ne;
200  ne = he->clw_rotate_about_source();
201  }
202 
203  return he;
204 };
